# About

::: {.section-description}
Code & Circuits is an engineer's notebook for exploring mathematics, electronics, and programming.
:::

## Purpose

This site serves as a collection of technical notes, tutorials, and explorations across various engineering disciplines. The content focuses on:

- Mathematical foundations for engineering applications
- Electronic circuit design and analysis
- Programming and software development
- Data science and machine learning

## Structure

Content is organized into:

- **Posts**: Regular articles and tutorials on specific topics
- **Topic Areas**: Curated collections of related content organized by subject
- **Code Notebooks**: Interactive examples and demonstrations

## Technical Details

This site is:

- Built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org)
- Written in Markdown and Jupyter notebooks
- Source code available on [GitHub](https://github.com/yourusername/site-repo)

:::
